post_title: Sale or T SGC T206 HOFer portraits, Waddell, Collins, McGraw
post_content:
Hey all,
I’ve been able to upgrade some backs for the HOFer backs line so have some Piedmont HOFer portraits that can go.

Prices below. PayPal or Zelle.

I would consider trade for Piedmont 42 HOFers that I need. I also need a Cobb Bat On and Crawford Throwing to finish off my HOFer set. Looking for SGC 3-4 holders for Cobb and Crawford. I’m not picky on P42, just trying to put a couple more together. As always a cash take it has rights to that card if a trade isn’t finished first.

Jimmy Collins SGC 4 P350- $435
McGraw no cap SGC 3.5 P150- $360

Waddell SGC 3 P350- $$$0ld
Beckley P350 SGC 3 P350- $$$0ld
Chase Blue (super sharp, spot of paper loss on back) SGC 3 SC350/30- $$$0ld

Thanks,
Bob

PM me with any questions.
Ill take the Beckley. PM sent!
